complaint.description: Long wait for resolution, lack of communication, unhelpful when reconsidering purchase
complaint.suggestion: Improve response time, provide clear timelines, train customer service representatives to be more helpful

meta.review_content:
Its such a pity you have to give a star rating before being able to write your review, Vodacom don't even deserve the single star! 

I am still waiting for "being contacted in due course", like I said before they didn't mention which year that would be!

My trouble started in September and its still not resolved, however they are gladly taking my money.

I said before that they are great when a person agrees to buy something from them but should you reconsider, (within the 14 days) they will not or can not help you. 

I am still waiting for Ziyanda to get back to me from last week and now I'm still waiting for the computer to get back to me, the one who contacted me via  Hellopeter on Friday. Even the computer is set to lie. 

I can almost guarantee that I will get a robot response back faster than I'll get a human response.
